how to create account: Account banane ke liye top right corner pe 'Sign Up' button pe click karein.
where are filtered cvs: Chatbot ke baad aapko /filtered-results page par redirect kiya jata hai.
how to schedule interview: Filtered CVs me se candidate select karke 'Schedule Interview' button dabayein.
how to shortlist: Candidate profile ke neeche 'Shortlist' option milega, uspe click karein.
how to use chatbot: Chatbot page par jaake apni query natural language me type karein jaise 'Node.js ke 5 saal ke experience wale CVs dikhao'.
